title: (03202) Elx - 10 Passeig de l'Estació

title_short: (03202) Elx - 5 Carrer Nuestra Señora de la Cabeza
description: Parking with a large capacity, very close to the center. On Friday and Saturday nights, they drink. You can find gorillas or concerts. It is usually a safe place. Without service but about 300 m from the municipal park where there are fountains and toilets. Also next to the downtown pools. Next to the tourist office. Interesting to do the Ili Palmir route especially if you are traveling with children.

It has trees that provide shade. There is very close a vegan restaurant and supermarkets and bars. The only two drawbacks? There is traffic noise as is normal in the city and on Thursdays there is a market.

description: Picnic area of Elche, area where you can rest and go to see the river or the vicinity of the Elche reservoir. Good area for bikes and hiking. On weekends if people tend to go. It does not have water or electricity.

title: (03293) Daimés -
description: We are located between Elche and La Foia, fully enclosed private land near the Alcudia archaeological site. 3 pitches maximum for more comfort and tranquility. 6A electricity, water drain filling, Wi-Fi, tennis court, pétanque track, cycle path nearby, bicycle and tandem, helmet and life jacket available, start of the Rio Vinalopo discovery hike, library, swimming pool. a moment of relaxation with jacuzzi and sauna

title: (03296) Matola - 9 Carrer Rosales
description: Parking outside the hacienda/restaurant La Roscana. In the middle of agricultural fields, ample parking, away from the road, quiet, no service.

name: Finca La Signatura
title: (03139) Finca La Signatura
description: Finca La Signatura. A little paradise for holidaymakers with 3 spacious, bushed areas for motorhomes or caravans. Beautiful large swimming pool, trampoline and a bowling alley. Nice and clean sanitary facilities. Anne and Nick make you feel welcome on this beautiful and peaceful finca nestled between the plantations. There is also a holiday home and guest room. Overall a lovely place to stay. The area is flat so excellent for cycling, 6 km from the beach and 7 km from the palm city of Elche. Shops in the immediate vicinity. Due to the limited number of places, calling/Whatsapp in advance is recommended.

title: (03139) Barri Alt - 1032A Partida Valverde Alto
description:
Small-scale camper place for max 5 campers.
Beautifully situated between Santa Pola and Elche, both places are 7 km away and easily accessible by bike.
Supermarket and restaurants less than 2km.
Please call in advance for availability.
Not suitable for children under 12 years!
NB! Water and empty waste water tank or toilet only for guests! Minimum stay 2 nights!

title: (03339) Crevillent -
description: Very quite during the night, flat and with a little walk by the hill you will get a nice view on the lake. Nice for one night.

title: (03339) Crevillente - 11 CV-875
description: Drinking water and air service at the Repsol gas station

name: Finca Familia
title: (03113) Finca Familia
description: Finca Familia is run by a Dutch family who have made their dream come true. Thanks to the friendly atmosphere, small scale, hospitality and personal attention, you will soon feel like family. Your pets are also welcome with us. It is a mini campsite located in a quiet area with a beautiful view of the cities of Alicante and Elche. Both towns, the beach and the airport are 15-20 minutes away by car. Alenda Golf is a 5 minute drive away. We offer: showers, toilets, sinks, washing up area, WiFi, pétanque court, spacious pitches, large swimming pool with free deckchairs, possibility to empty the toilet cassette, water and a cozy common room with darts. For an additional fee, we offer a shopping service, electricity, laundry, transfers to the desired places, dog sitting service.Visit our facebook page minicampingfincafamilia or contact us without obligation. Do you want to come and visit us? Of course we like it ;-) Because navigation sometimes requires our guests to drive on impassable roads, we strongly advise you to contact us beforehand. We can then provide you with the correct route so that you arrive without problems. We look forward to welcoming you to our Finca, Sincerely, Finca Familia ☀.

title: (03320) Torrellano - 25 Circunvalación de Alicante
description: GALP gas station with water and air dispenser. The type of dispenser is trigger but the flow is medium.

name: Cementerio Torrellano
title: (03320) Cementerio Torrellano
description: Parking at the cemetery. You can hear the highway. Ideally located near Alicante airport.

name: ACAEP Caravanas y Autocaravanas
title: (03294) ACAEP Caravanas y Autocaravanas
description: Reception area between individuals in Partida Daimes polygon 3 number 221-D to spend the night with a caravan or motorhome. Quiet place where you can spend one or more nights, 3km from the town of La Hoya where there is everything you need, restaurants, financial institutions, supermarkets and a gas station. There is a bus stop both to go up to Elche and to go down to the beaches of La Marina which are about 4 km away and where you can also visit natural bird spots. We are on the road from Elche-Elx to the Marina at km-8 on the right going down from Elche-Elx. Sign up with Carlos via WhatsApp.

title: (03139) Valverde - 2050 Partida Valverde Bajo
description: Place to park and spend the night, has a supermarket next door and near a bus stop that takes you to the beaches. It is the parking lot of the supermarket and the owners allow you to spend the night, a good place to spend the night if you are on the way to somewhere

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer Aeroport
description: Wide and well leveled field on the outskirts of Torrellano. It is very close to the airport and it is noisy although at night from 0:30 to 6:30 there is no air traffic. Scandal bakery 3 min walk.

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer de la Pau
title_short: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer de la Pau
description: Simple dirt parking. Next to downtown for groceries and laundromat 2 blocks away. Very good Turkish kebab not far away. To check if there are not market days. We spent the weekend there with no worries.

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - 16 Avinguda de Illice
title_short: (03320) Torre del Pla - 16 Avinguda de Illice

title: (03680) Aspe - 99 Avenida Orihuela
description: Ample paved and level space to park next to the Aspe cemetery, a quiet place next to a supermarket, park and close to the town with all kinds of services.

title: (03294) Santa Fé - 3073B Partida Hoya
description:
***Please note, minimum stay is 72 hours***
Small, private camper place of Dutch/Swiss owners with 5 places. Beautiful pitch between the palm trees with a beautiful large swimming pool. There is also a casita that one can rent. Closed area so very safe. 5 km from the El Pinet beach, 3 km to the town of la Hoya with bakery, supermarket and restaurants, 13 km to the famous palm park of Elche and 25 km from Alicante.
Because there are only 5 places, it is advisable to call or send a whatsapp first. They speak Dutch, English, (Swiss) German and French

title: (03320) Torrellano - 2027 Partida Torrellano Alto
description: Caravan & Camper Parking. Overnight acceptance & airport transfer included in price. Nice garden & bbq area available.

title: (03330) Crevillent - 93 Carrer Barranc
description: We have spent the night here. Little crowded place. very well

title: (03339) Crevillent -
description: Parking possibility for the climbing spots around. Nice and quiet place. Unfortunetely there was a lot of trash. We collected a bit and took it with us. Please leave the place clean and with responsibility.

name: Camperplaats Het kartonnen huis
title: (03680) Camperplaats Het kartonnen huis
description:
Camperplaats The cardboard house known from Ik Vertrek.

An attractive and small-scale Camperplaats in Aspe to relax in a beautiful cycling and walking environment.

A beautiful location just outside the village of Aspe, located on the Campo surrounded by mountains.

Aspe center is easy to reach on foot, by bicycle or car. Aspe has many restaurants and supermarkets, the nearest supermarket is 2 kilometers from our house.

The friendly atmosphere, small scale, hospitality and personal attention will quickly make you feel at home.

We have 4 spacious camper pitches (8x8 meters) that are not suitable for pets.

We have 6 spacious camper pitches (11x7 meters) between the olive trees that are suitable for pets. The olive trees provide shade for your pet. We also have a fenced in dog play area where the dog can run/run free where there is a rubbish bin with free poop bags.

NB
Campers no larger than 8 meters
Reservations can only be made by appointment
Pets allowed
Check-in from 12:00 PM and check-out is until 12:00 PM.

Sunday is a 'day off' for us, hence no check-in and check-out option.

title: (03680) Alicante - 7 Plaça Poligono 46
description: Esplanade with trees and a picnic area within a park, it has a fountain and rubbish bins, quite flat. It is located next to a road but quiet at night, yes, lots of mosquitoes

Elche and Alicante can be visited within a good distance by bike, public transport or car. Please call or email ahead, limited seating.

title: (03688) Hondón de las Nieves - 2 Calle San José
title_short: (03688) Hondón de las Nieves - 2 Calle San José

title: (03194) Elx - 9025 Lugar Marina Urbanizable
description: Flat terrain behind the sports hall, with dirt floors, bushes and trees. Ample for a few ACs / campers. It is a discreet and very quiet place where you can spend the night for free near the natural park of Las Salinas. You can park earlier on the road or follow the stony path and turn to the right to go more unnoticed. Sometimes those who go to the sports center park here. Container nearby.

name: J'S Oase

description:
Beautiful pitch surrounded by vineyards in the mountains of Aspe.

Only possible with registration, as there is a limited number of places available.

name: Casa La Marina

A small campsite with swimming pool, restrooms, laundry and other recreational facilities. Minimum 3 days stay. Swedish and English speaking staff. Non smoking campsite!
welcome.

description: Small-scale camper place for 2 to 3 campers, located in a quiet place. Large enclosed garden with several seating areas and a self-service pool bar. Opportunity to wash. Pets allowed.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - Avenue Vincente de Blasco Ibanez
title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - Avenue Vincente de Blasco Ibanez

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 13 Avenida Valencia
description: Grand playa Laundry.

title: (03660) Novelda - 6A Carrer Elda
description: Unpaved area, we spent two very quiet nights, a little dirty due to dog feces. 10 min. walking from the center.

title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - 10 Avinguda Portus Ⅱ - Licitanus
description: Great parking very central, not possible to use it on market days. It is next to the health center. Very quiet to sleep. In spite of the fact that in this town the Motorhomes are not welcome. They still confuse the issue of parking and camping ... Anyway ... I've been using it for years.

title: (03349) San Isidro - Partida veintiuno nr 14
description:
Small-scale and cozy camper place along the A7. Beautiful garden with swimming pool. Dogs can play to their heart's content in our enclosed garden of 10,000 m2. Chemical toilet can only be used if an organic product is used. (We do not use any chemicals)
Also no dogs and sunscreen in the pool.
Car available.

Spoken languages:
Dutch English German French Spanish.

Hasta luego!

In the adjacent areas you have a bakery, ice cream parlor, two bars, and a small park area for children. It is perfect to spend one or two nights. Of course, the beach is 700 meters away on foot.

Access by dirt track in perfect condition and suitable for all types of vehicle. Ideal place to visit the San Cayetano Mountain Park and start one of the most classic hiking trails in the area.

name: Camping La Marina
title: (03194) Camping La Marina
description: Top place. Recommended by ADAC. 450 pitches for mobile homes, tents and caravans. Additionally 50 bungalows +10 luxury villas. All services available: bars, restaurants, supermarket, laundry service. In the high season with animation program and huge water park. A 3000 m² wellness facility, which is also open in winter. (Additional chargeable). The price includes WiFi and electricity (10A). Water tap available on site. About 700 m to the beach. Very nice path through the dune landscape and pine forests. Also good to ride a bike. The beach has received the blue European flag for quality. The pitches come in different sizes. All pitches are shaded in summer. Multilingual reception. Very nice vegetation on the square. The pitches are separated from each other with plants. This place leaves nothing to be desired.

title: (03195) Elx - Camino del cabo
description: Quiet location stayed here overnight right close to sand Junes  it says there are restrictions for camping police swing by and didn’t bother us during the winter months

title: (03194) Guardamar del Segura - 11 Urbanización Costa Bella-la Marina

title: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 17 Calle Costa Bella
title_short: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 17 Calle Costa Bella
description: Beach car park without any amenities. Sea is 500m away, cafe and excellent restaurant (Rivingtons) over the road. Gravel surface and only small light overnight from campsite next door.

title: (03008) Alacant - 3 Calle Bélgica
description: Parking, normally quiet, near the N-332, there are two hotels, near the city of light, at night without problem. No service just parking.

title: (03130) Alicante - 27 Partida Balsares
description: Had parked in the parking lot because the one ahead was full to walk to the beach. Parking lot and surroundings full of garbage!! Beach is nudist and not very nice. Although beach in the water itself large stones and many algae-like round soft parts. We had the dog with a prohibition sign we didn't see it. There are also no shady places totally overcrowded at the weekend. No real recommendation unfortunately...

title: (03150) Dolores - 19 Diseminado Mayayo
description: High-pressure washing for trucks + vacuum cleaner.

name: Finca Las Alegrias
title: (03688) Finca Las Alegrias
description:
We are Carlos and Emi and have followed our dream and found our little paradise in Spain.
We would like to share this with nice people.
Carlos likes to work with wood and recycled material and we try to reuse everything as much as possible.
There is still a lot to be made and all ideas are welcome.

We also have a picking garden from which we make our own limoncello and olive oil also from our own trees.
The dog playground is made of recycled wood and the roof of pallets.

Do you like to enjoy and use all this or maybe help yourself, you are very welcome with us.
You may use our sanitary facilities, swimming pool, and have 4 parking spaces for campers.
We also have a guest house for 2 persons for children of helping friends.
Dogs are of course welcome as long as they are friendly and socialised.

So if you would like to build with us or if you want to be creative or just relax and read a book, you can do this with us in the silence along the mountains of the Hondon Valley.

We charge a fee for the parking costs and you will have to pay for the electricity if you need it.
All other services are free.
Maximum length 8 meters
Please call if there is room.

Greetings Carlos & Emi

name: Finca La Montañosa
title: (03688) Finca La Montañosa
description: Bed and breakfast with room for 10 campers. Very well received by Dutch owners. There is also a restaurant with English speaking service

There is a staircase so that you can also clean the roof. Next door there is a car wash in 2 different heights. Staff very nice and helpful.

title: (03195) Santa Pola - Camino del cabo
description: Two very large, unpaved and somewhat bumpy car parks. There is a small road but with little traffic (practically nothing at night). In the top parking lot there is a decent telephone signal (4G), in the one near the sea it is poor (3G). The advice is to park so that everyone has space. Unfortunately, there are always bullies who get on the side and occupy three seats. Then of course they expose everything, awning, chairs, ... do this and then it will end like in Portugal. 5 km away there is the possibility of loading and unloading (regularly) for only 5 Euros.

title: (03177) San Fulgencio - C. Mar Cantabrico, 17

title: (03008) Alacant - 4 Carrer de la Badia

title: (03130) Santa Pola - Camino del Carabasí

System setting D!) No size limit and places for large vehicles (see photos). The police made a few rounds but said nothing. Castle to visit but check his days depending on the season, for example closed Monday in August.

title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - Faro del Cabo de Santa Pola

No services on site, and very little network (edge) at the end of the road because of the radar antennas. No height / width limit.

name: La Fabrica Dolores Art Living Events
title: (03150) La Fabrica Dolores Art Living Events
title_short: (03150) La Fabrica Dolores Art Living Events
description:
Welcome to Jonathan & Michael – the now legendary campground exclusively for adults aged 14 and above, starting from October 2023. We've gained cult status and international recognition for our innovations and warm hospitality. Fluent in 8 languages, we offer countless cultural and recreational activities, regular events, and valuable tips for your stay. Just minutes away from breathtaking beaches, dunes, and pine forests, with shopping and dining options within walking distance. Easy to find on Google Maps with Park4Night. Want to extend your stay? We'd love to have you!

Dogs:
Attention: No Off-Leash Dogs Allowed & Only Quiet Dogs Allowed
-----
Prices:
Vehicle and trailer length less than 8 meters
1 night: €14
1 month: €350
Plus €2 for total length over 8 meters (night)
------
Service inclusive:
- 2 adults and 1 pet
- Gray and black water
- Fill up with water
- WIFI Fiber optic internet (high speed)
- WC & showers (hot water)
- Fitness / Gym
------
Service exklusiv:
- Electricity 3 € (6 Ampere) or 0.50/kwh
- Washing 5 €
- Additional adults €4
- Additional animals €1
----
Car rental:
1 Day / 25 €
----
Professional help and translation service
(Repairs, notary, doctor, lawyers, real estate, etc. fluent in the following languages:
Spanish / German / English / Dutch / French /
€ 15 per hour

Guided tours, climbing, hikes etc. with Jonathan.
Price depends on the number of people

title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - 22 Partida Bancal de la Arena

The whole side of the road towards the sea seems to be closed and therefore impossible to stay at night. Plants and trees are installed on the old car parks. The police pass frequently. This place is nothing special but you are alone, 100 m from the sea and on the "mountains" behind you, a lighthouse protects the coast.

description: Here you are right next to the sea. The road is not busy. WARNING! A few meters further, an area begins where overnight stays with motorhomes are expressly prohibited (with signage). Here, he is apparently still allowed.

It is a parking lot that is past the eucalyptus path, about 10 vans fit on the level part direct access to the beach and the dunes of Guardamar, quiet. There are fishermen coming and going throughout the night, and pumpstation goes on sometimes (quite noisy if you wake up easily). 
Accessible from the north side of the river.

title: (03008) Alicante (Alacant) - 3 Calle Peru
description: Place in the heart of the city in the San Gabriel area. Prices somewhat high for what is seen in the market. Dryer somewhat cheaper than in other places for the duration time 12 minutes. It has an exchange machine. Around there is a hairdresser, a couple of bars and a supermarket about 4 minutes walk. There are no bathrooms inside.

name: Alannia Guardamar
title: (03140) Alannia Guardamar
description: Camping Marjal 5 *. Great luxury very clean, cheap with the ACSI card out of season. Not far from the beach (5 minutes). Not far from Guardamar (30 minutes). Pool heated in winter.

title_short: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 17 Carrer Basilio Paredes

title: (03698) Agost - 62 Partida Sol del Camp
description: Picnic area and large parking area with immediate access to the Via Verde De Maigmó. Possibly busy during holidays and weekends. Large town of Agost within easy walking distance for bars, restaurants and shops. Lidl supermarket at 12km. Tranquil location, great for cycling and walking with lovely views. An undiscovered little paradise.

title: (03007) Alacant - 21 Carrer Asil
description: Free parking opened all day long. Close to a "dia" supermarket and the babel local market. Close to the city centre too,  just 10 minutes on foot. Attention ! you have to take into account that thursdays and saturdays it becomes a street market so you can't park there. In front of the parking there is a local park where there is a source of water and a toilets.

title: (03006) Alacant - 19 Carrer Lira
description: Lavenderia / washing machines. Coin changer machine.

title: (03006) Alicante (Alacant) - 1 Calle Periodista Espinosa Ec
description: Ground parking. Good to visit the city. Not too far from the central station and bus terminal station. No service. I seem to be quiet and without too much risk. To go downtown, cross over footbridge and then on the right.

title: () Almoradí - 56 Calle Granados
description: Pitch, next to the sports center, well signposted, spacious, flat. Sporting events until 9 p.m. and quiet from 10 p.m. Cars can hardly be heard, despite the nearby roundabout. Ideal to visit the city or to spend a quiet night. Laundromat at the roundabout. Gulli for emptying gray water is at the back of the square, towards the stairs. Water tap with good pressure at the entrance of the parking lot.

title: (03689) Fondó dels Frares - 12 CV-845
description: Gravel parking, slight slope, calm road in this month of May. no service. Very good for one night.

title: (03160) Almoradí - 1 Avenida Príncipe España
description: Laundry, LA COLADA, good access near the motorhome area.

title: (03005) Alicante (Alacant) - 9 Calle Isla de Corfú
description: Great place to spend the night, in a very quiet and bright neighborhood street. A lot of parking at night. For the most complicated day because it is next to two schools. 5 minutes from the exit of the highway.

title: (03003) Alicante (Alacant) - 14A Muelle Poniente
description: Quiet street parking next to newly created park. Good access to town centre. More likely to find a space from late afternoon onwards as busy with office workers in morning. More room for shorter vans further on road but long vans need to park at beginning of road. Water tap at each large gate entrance. Nice walk through the park.

title: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 26 Calle Madrid
description: Large online parking area on a side street next to the gas station. Slightly sloping. You can park day and night, a lot of traffic, but a bright place. We have stayed here without problems. There is a laundry at the gas station. They have LPG and AdBlue. Nearby there are shops and the town center is one km away.

title: (03003) Alicante (Alacant) - 3 Avenida de Loring
description: Parking for buses and motorhomes. 10 min. Walking from the beach along a beautiful tree-lined walk. Parking is paid and has no services. You can stay overnight.

title: (03005) Alicante (Alacant) - 2B Calle Juanito Santero
description: Convenient place for overnight stay, downhill or uphill depending on how you want to park, little passage is very safe.

title_short: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 145 Calle Ingeniero Codorníu
description: Parking place

title: (03340) Alicante -
description: Stop for the Rambla Salada hike. Several level outskirts. Very quiet night, no traffic.

title: (03005) Alacant - 21 Avenida Doctor Rico
description: Parking without service at fifteen minutes walk from the Center of the city of Alicante, near Mercadona supermarket and Castell restaurant

title: (03005) Alicante (Alacant) - 4 Calle Hondón de los Frailes
title_short: (03005) Alicante (Alacant) - 4 Calle Hondón de los Frailes
